revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 63:;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 37 obols 3, surcharges drachmas 2 obols 2 chalki 2, in total drachmas 39 obols 5 chalki 2;;naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year drachma 1, surcharges obol 0.5 chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total drachma 1 obol 1.;Serenos, son of Sokrates, grandson of Pakysis, mother Satornilaine, drachmas 8;;Hermes, slave of Saturnilus Nigerinus, drachmas 12;;Kerdon, slave of Maronis, daughter of Areios, drachmas 12;;Agathopous, another slave of the same woman, drachmas 12;;Sarapion alias Sokrates, son of Achillas, grandson of Hatres, mother Tamarron, drachmas 12;;Melas, son of Serenos, soldier (son of Sokrates, son of Pakysis);naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year drachmas 4, surcharges obols 2.5, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 4 obols 3;;(in left margin: drachmas 12 obols 25) tax on land plots in release likewise drachma 1 obols 2.5, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total drachma 1 obols 4.5;;grammateia drachmas 4 obol 0.5, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 4 obols 2 chalki 2;;dovecote tax for the 13th year drachmas 3, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 3 obol 1 chalki 2;;Ptollas, son of Sabeinos, grandson of Ptolemaios, mother Vettia, drachmas 16;;Kames, son of Petheus (Kames , son of Ouamaes);;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 4 obols 2 chalki 2, tax on the produce of olives obols 4, naubion obols 2.5 chalki 2, surcharges drachma 1 obol 0.5 chalki 2;;(in left margin: drachmas 40)eparourion drachmas 2 obols 3.5, surcharges obol 1.5, kollybos drachmas 9 obols 3.5 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 10 obols 5.5, surcharges obols 4 chalki 2, in total drachmas 11 obols 3.5 chalki 2;;and Tamarres, daughter of Apynchis;;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira obols 5, naubion obol 0.5, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2;;eparourion obols 3.5, surcharges obol 0.5, kollybos 0.5, in total drachmas 1 obols 5 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 2 obol 0.5, surcharges obol 1, in total drachmas 2 obol 1.5;;and Tamarron, daughter of Onnophris, formerly Zoidous, daughter of Mysthes;;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 2 obols 3, tax on the produce of olives obols 2 chalki 2, naubion obol 1.5, surcharges obols 3.5 chalki 2;;eparourion drachma 1 obols 4, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 5 obols 4 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 6 obol 1.5, surcharges obols 2.5, in total drachmas 6 obols 4;;in total for the day drachmas 304 obols 2.;(Pachon) 15 likewise:;Peteesis, daughter of Satabous through the agency of (Isidoros, son of Koulax);;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 7 obols 3, tax on the produce of olives drachma 1 obol 0.5, naubion obols 4.5, surcharges drachma 1 obols 5 chalki 2;;(in left margin: drachmas 36 obols 18) eparourion drachmas 5, surcharges obols 2 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 16 obols 5 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 18 obols 4.5, surcharges drachma 1 obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 19 obols 5.5 chalki 2;;naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year obols 2 chalki 2, surcharges chalki 2, kollybos obols 2.5 chalki 2;;Valerius alias Heron, son of Dioskoros, grandson of Mysthes, mother Tepheros, drachmas 20;;Neilammon alias Isidoros, his son, mother Tapasion, drachmas 20;;Dioskoros, son of Dioskoros, grandson of Chairemon, mother Tapasion, drachmas 20;;Sabeinos, son of Petheus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Herakleia, drachmas 8 copper drachmas 4;;Aphrodisios, son of Sisois, grandson of Petheus, mother Thaisas drachmas 12 copper drachmas 4."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
